半季: (はんき) - half-year (sometimes esp. as an Edo-period duration of employment); half of a season
半官半民: (はんかんはんみん) - (yoji) semi-governmental; semi-official
半導体ウエハ: (はんどうたいウエハ) - semiconductor wafer
半導体ディスク: (はんどうたいディスク) - semiconductor disk
半島人: (はんとうじん) - peninsular person (old pejorative for Koreans)
半島国: (はんとうこく) - peninsular country (e.g. Italy, Korea)
半島系: (はんとうけい) - Korean living in Japan; person of Korean descent
半幅帯: (はんはばおび) - half-width obi (kimono sash)
半平: (はんぺい) - pounded fish cake; (半片 only) half a slice/half a ticket/ticket stub
半年後: (はんとしご) - after half a year
半截: (はんせつ) - cutting in half; (esp. 半折) painting or calligraphy done on a half-sized piece of paper
半折: (はんせつ) - cutting in half; (esp. 半折) painting or calligraphy done on a half-sized piece of paper
半挿: (はにぞう) - teapot-like object made typically of lacquerware and used to pour hot and cold liquids; basin of water with two handles on either side used for washing one's face or hands
半搗き: (はんつき) - light-brown rice; half-polished rice; partially polishing rice
半数: (はんすう) - half the number; haploid
半数体: (はんすうたい) - haploid (organism, cell, etc.)
半数必中界: (はんすうひっちゅうかい) - circular error probability (measure of missile accuracy); circular error probable; CEP
半時: (はんじ) - (はんとき only) little while/short time; an hour; (はんじ only)  half-hour/half an hour
半時間: (はんじかん) - half an hour (period of); half hour
半月: (はんげつ) - {astron} half-moon; half month; semicircle
半月形: (はんげつがた) - semicircular; crescent-shaped; half-moon
半棒術: (はんぼうじゅつ) - form of martial art using a short cane staff
半歩: (はんぽ) - half step; half a step
半死半生: (はんしはんしょう) - (yoji) all but dead; half killed
半泣き: (はんなき) - being about to cry; the verge of tears
半減: (はんげん) - reduction by half; halve
半濁点: (はんだくてん) - maru mark; semivoiced sound; p-sound
半濁音: (はんだくおん) - semivoiced sound; p-sound
半濁音符: (はんだくおんふ) - maru mark; semivoiced sound; p-sound
半焼: (はんしょう) - partial destruction by fire
半焼け: (はんやけ) - half-burnt; half-done; half-baked; rare
半熟卵: (はんじゅくたまご) - soft boiled egg
半熟練工: (はんじゅくれんこう) - semiskilled worker
半片: (はんぺん) - pounded fish cake; (半片 only) half a slice/half a ticket/ticket stub
半獣神: (はんじゅうしん) - goat-god; satyr; Pan; Faunus
半玉: (はんたま) - half portion of noodles or fried rice; half ball (of noodles)
半生菓子: (はんなまがしい) - semiperishable sweets; half-dry confectionery
半田フィレット: (はんだフィレット) - solder fillet
半畳: (はんじょう) - half tatami mat; heckling/jeering/interrupting/hissing
半畳を入れる: (はんじょうをいれる) - to interrupt; to jeer
半畳を打つ: (はんじょうをうつ) - to interrupt; to jeer
半白: (はんぱく) - grayish color/greyish colour; grizzled hair
半目: (はんもく) - half a point (esp. in go)
半直線: (はんちょくせん) - half line; ray
半眼で: (はんがんで) - with a half-opened eye
半睡半醒: (はんすいはんせい) - (yoji) half asleep and half awake
半知半解: (はんちはんかい) - (yoji) superficial knowledge; half knowledge
